alkis.check_index: Check the status of the ALKIS search index
alkis.create_index: Create an internal ALKIS search index for a project
alkis.parse: Preprocess the NAS data model files
alkis.parse:--path: path to the NAS zip archive
auth.clear: Logo ut all users and remove all active sessions
auth.passwd: Encode a password for the authorization file
cache.drop:--layers: comma separated list of layer IDs
cache.seed:--layers: comma separated list of layer IDs
cache.seed:--level: zoom level to build the cache for
cache.status:--layers: comma separated list of layer IDs
cache.updateweb: Update the front (web) cache from the back cache
cache.updateweb:--layers: comma separated list of layer IDs
config.dump:--out: path to write the dump to
ows.caps: Query the capabilities of a service
server.reload: Reconfigure and gracefully reload the server
server.reset: Gracefully reload the server without reconfiguring
